author: Ruben Hassid
author_headline: Master AI before it masters you.
text:
You underestimate the power of ChatGPTs memory.

Copy & paste my prompt to update it:

– THE PROMPT TO UPDATE THE MEMORY –

## MEMORY_WRITE
Fact: “[what you want exactly]”
Purpose: “[in which context you need it]”
## END

______________________________

– THE PROMPT TO ERASE THE MEMORY –

Forget the following instruction stored in your memory:

## instructions to delete

## MEMORY_WRITE
Fact: “[what you want exactly]”
Purpose: “[in which context you need it]”
## END

## END

______________________________
